name: CRYPTOPLASM EPHEMERA 04
description: This series of works entitled Ephemera shows the progressive exploration of the CRYPTOPLASM concept. This ephemera is made from a relic of WORKSITE II which took place in Bruxelles on the 8 September 2018 at A Performance Affair, curated by Liv Vaisberg, Frédéric de Goldschmidt and Will Kerr. This 3D scanned brick and mortar is recomposed to build an autonomous architectural vocabulary that will be adopted to create complete AR or printed cryptoplasmic architectures. This NFT is registered in the Cryptoplasm Table of Elements.
